code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{Book}from'./Book';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function BooksReservation(){const{id}=useParams();const[book,setBook]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("/api/books/${id}").then(response=>{setBook(response.data);}).catch(error=>{console.error("Klaida gaunant knyga:",error);});},[id]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"items-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:book.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Author: ",book.author]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Year: ",book.year]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Type: ",book.type]})]});};
